metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35531 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within the get_huffman_diff() function (libraw\src\x3f\x3f_utils_patched.cpp) when reading data from an image file.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
